<a id="VideoStreamTheora"></a>

# VideoStreamTheora

**Inherits:** [VideoStream](VideoStream.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

[VideoStream](VideoStream.md) resource for Ogg Theora videos.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

[VideoStream](VideoStream.md) resource handling the [Ogg Theora](https://www.theora.org/) video format with ``.ogv`` extension. The Theora codec is decoded on the CPU.

\ **Note:** While Ogg Theora videos can also have a ``.ogg`` extension, you will have to rename the extension to ``.ogv`` to use those videos within Redot.
